mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lodging WHERE idx = #{idx} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
SELECT * FROM photo WHERE lodging_num = #{lodgingNum} AND deleted_yn = 'N'

SELECT idx, user_id, comment, clean_grade, accuracy_grade, communication_grade, location_grade, check_in_grade, cost_grade, lodging_num, deleted_yn, (CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, review_create_dt, NOW()) <= 0 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, review_create_dt, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, review_create_dt, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, review_create_dt, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, review_create_dt, NOW()), '시간 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, review_create_dt, NOW()) < 30 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, review_create_dt, NOW()), '일 전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, review_create_dt, NOW()), '달 전') END) AS review_create_dt FROM review WHERE lodging_num = #{lodgingNum} AND deleted_yn = 'N'

SELECT avg(cast(clean_grade as float)) as clean_grade, avg(cast(accuracy_grade as float)) as accuracy_grade, avg(cast(communication_grade as float)) as communication_grade, avg(cast(location_grade as float)) as location_grade, avg(cast(check_in_grade as float)) as check_in_grade, avg(cast(cost_grade as float)) as cost_grade, round((clean_grade + accuracy_grade + communication_grade + location_grade + check_in_grade + cost_grade) / 6, 1) as review_total, count(*) as review_count FROM review WHERE lodging_num = #{lodgingNum} AND deleted_yn = 'N'

SELECT idx, lodging_num, usable_yn, (CASE comfort_id WHEN 'SD101' THEN '보안카메라' WHEN 'SD102' THEN '화재경보기' WHEN 'SD103' THEN '일산화탄소경보기' WHEN 'SD104' THEN '소화기' WHEN 'SD105' THEN '구급상자' WHEN 'PD101' THEN '건물내무료주차' WHEN 'PD102' THEN '건물내유료주차' WHEN 'CD101' THEN '에어컨' WHEN 'CD102' THEN '난방' WHEN 'ED101' THEN '무선인터넷' WHEN 'ED102' THEN 'TV' WHEN 'BD101' THEN '욕조' WHEN 'BD102' THEN '샤워기' WHEN 'BD103' THEN '수건' WHEN 'BD104' THEN '비누' WHEN 'BD105' THEN '화장지' WHEN 'BD106' THEN '헤어드라이어' WHEN 'BD107' THEN '샴푸' WHEN 'BD108' THEN '세탁기' WHEN 'BD109' THEN '건조기' WHEN 'BD110' THEN '청소용품' WHEN 'BD201' THEN '침대' WHEN 'BD202' THEN '침대시트' WHEN 'BD203' THEN '침구' WHEN 'KD101' THEN '냉장고' WHEN 'KD102' THEN '전자레인지' WHEN 'KD103' THEN '가스레인지인덕션' WHEN 'KD104' THEN '식기류' WHEN 'SD201' THEN '장기숙박가능' WHEN 'SD202' THEN '반려동물입실가능' WHEN 'SD203' THEN '게스트전용출입문' WHEN 'SD204' THEN '바베큐그릴' WHEN 'SD205' THEN '수영장' WHEN 'SD206' THEN '조식' END) as comfort_id FROM comforts WHERE lodging_num = #{lodgingNum} AND usable_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY 4;
